member.name: P:ClinicMaster.My.Resources.Resources.Utilities
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to /*************************************************************** This Script is a property of ClinicMaster INTERNATIONAL Un authorised use or ammendment is not permitted -- Last updated 10/02/2016 by Wilson Kutegeka ***************************************************************/
use ClinicMaster go
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ---------------------- Functions -> Triggers -> Views ---------------------------------------- [rest of string was truncated]";.
